note.p: Career: Lecturer in Experimental Science, King's College, London; investigated surface tension of liquids; gave up science for poetry; Dante Lecturer, University College, London (1878-1880)
References: F Kurzer, 'The life and work of Charles Tomlinson FRS: A Career in Victorian Science and Technology' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 203-226
Notes: F Crace Calvert has signed election certificate twice
